lead_paragraph: Massachusetts scored five goals in about seven and a half minutes to send the game into overtime, and Jim Connolly's goal halfway through the extra period gave the Minutemen an improbable 11-10 victory.
snippet: Massachusetts scored five goals in about seven and a half minutes to send the game into overtime, and Jim Connolly's goal halfway through the extra period gave the Minutemen an improbable 11-10 victory.
